name: Entre Agulhas e Pinturas
description: Full-stack project for a Portuguese artisanal brand. On this website, users can, for example, create accounts, place orders, and also, if they wish, leave reviews for products.

name: This Website
description: This project is none other than the website you're currently exploring. Its code can be accessed by clicking on the image. Your constructive feedback and tips for improving the code are greatly appreciated!
